admin_templates.template:
{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}

{xen:raw $editLink}

<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][limit]" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.limit}" label="{$preparedOption.title}" hint="{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}"> <xen:disabled> {xen:phrase number_characters_to_display}: <xen:spinbox name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][length]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value.length}" min="0" step="10" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:checkboxunit>

{xen:phrase resource_category_permissions}: {$category.category_title} {xen:phrase permissions}
{xen:phrase private_category} {xen:phrase if_selected_users_only_view_category_if_granted_permissions}

{xen:phrase user_groups}

    {xen:phrase group_info}

{xen:phrase users}

    {xen:phrase user_info}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase node_permissions}: {$category.category_title} - {$user.username}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'resource-category-perms', $category}">{xen:phrase permissions}: {$category.category_title}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink 'resource-category-perms', $category}#{xen:helper listitemid, 'user_{$user.user_id}'}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/permission.js" /> <xen:require css="permission.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'resource-category-perms/user/save', $category}" class="PermissionChoices">
<xen:include template="permission_tooltip"> <xen:set var="$contentPermission">1</xen:set> </xen:include>
<fieldset id="piGroups">
<xen:include template="permission_check_all"> <xen:set var="$target"></xen:set> </xen:include>
<xen:foreach loop="$permissions" key="$permissionGroupId" value="$permissionGroup"> <xen:include template="permission_list_node_group" /> </xen:foreach>
</fieldset>
<input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="{$user.user_id}" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase update_permissions}" />
</xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase resource_category_permissions}: {$category.category_title} - {$userGroup.title}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink resource-category-perms, $category}">{xen:phrase permissions}: {$category.category_title}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink resource-category-perms, $category}#{xen:helper listitemid, 'user_group_{$userGroup.user_group_id}'}">{$userGroup.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/permission.js" /> <xen:require css="permission.css" />
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'resource-category-perms/user-group/save', $category}" class="PermissionChoices">
<xen:include template="permission_tooltip"> <xen:set var="$contentPermission">1</xen:set> </xen:include>
<fieldset id="piGroups">
<xen:include template="permission_check_all"> <xen:set var="$target">#piGroups</xen:set> </xen:include>
<xen:foreach loop="$permissions" key="$permissionGroupId" value="$permissionGroup"> <xen:include template="permission_list_node_group" /> </xen:foreach>
</fieldset>
<input type="hidden" name="user_group_id" value="{$userGroup.user_group_id}" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase update_permissions}" /> </xen:form>

option.default_value: zip txt pdf png jpg jpeg jpe gif psd tif

phrases.phrase: Adds an update to a watched resource
Allow new resources to be posted in this category
Allow resources to be created by
All resources within this category will be deleted and any child categories will be attached to this category's parent.
Always moderate resources posted in this category
Always moderate updates in this category
The automatically created thread will be given this prefix.
Automatically post in the resource thread on resource deletion
The body of this resource should be provided in the description.
You can not update your rating or review once the author has responded.
This category does not allow new resources.
The current version of a resource may not be deleted.
Explain why you're giving this rating. Reviews which are not constructive may be removed without notice.
A fileless resource may not have a download URL or an attached file.
If you enter a title and message, members watching your resource will be alerted. If you are updating your resource with a new version, this is a good place to note what's changed.
If you have an icon to upload for this resource, you will be given an option to upload this icon after saving. This icon should be 96x96 pixels.
If you have a specific location where you will be providing support or answering questions, please enter the URL here.
If you have your own web page containing a demo, extended description or support services etc. for this resource, enter its URL here.
If no resource types are selected, this category will be used to maintain the category hierarchy only.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the creator's behalf explaining that the resource is no longer available.
If selected, the resource creator and other members will not be able to see that who wrote the review. However, staff will still be able to see this.
If selected, users will only be able to view this category if they are explicitly granted permissions.
If you are updating your resource with a new version, upload the new file here. This is not required to post an update.
If a user does not have permission to create resources, this setting will not apply.
Include notifications for resources in sub-categories
Someone likes an update you have posted to accompany one of your resources
Resource review removed from public view
Resource update removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Resource version removed from public view (reason: {reason})
This is the name by which your resource will be known, and its version (such as 1.0).
No custom resource fields have been defined.
No prefixes have been added yet.
Allow specification of alternative support URL
If enabled, users can specify an alternative support URL for their resource. Note that even if this is specified, a discussion thread will be created if the category is configured to do so.
The maximum number of other resources to display from a resource's author. Use 0 to disable this block.
Options that control the resource manager add-on.

Normally, when threads are automatically created for resources, the thread title is just the resource's name. This option lets you specify a format for paid Resources. Use {title} where the resource title should appear.
If selected, users may only rate a resource version once they have downloaded it.
If enabled, users can choose to make their reviews anonymous. Staff will still be able to see who made the review, but end users will not.
Allow Icons to be Uploaded with Resources
If enabled, when a user submits a resource, they will have the option of specifying a small (96x96) icon. This icon will be displayed in resource lists and when viewing a resource.

Controls the currencies that users can select to apply to their resources. Add one currency per line. Each currency can only be 3 characters (USD, GBP, etc). The currency name will automatically be displayed in all caps.
When a resource is deleted, take this action with any automatically created thread.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
Limit viewing of fileless resources without download permissions
If selected, users that cannot download resources will not see full length descriptions for resources without a file.
Provide the maximum resource file size in kilobytes (KB). Resources over this size will be rejected.
The maximum number of recent reviews to display on the main resource view page. Use 0 to disable this block.
The maximum number of recent updates to display on the main resource view page. Use 0 to disable this block.
If enabled, users must submit a review when rating a resource.

If enabled, the All / Paid / Free will be shown in most situations. You may wish to hide these if you only support a specific type of resource or don't wish to allow users to filter to specific price statuses.
The number of resources that will be listed per page, including on the resource and category overview pages.
The maximum number of resources to display in the top resources list in resource navigation. Use 0 to disable this block.
Can reply to reviews for own resources
Please complete all commercial resource related fields.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following prefix
Please confirm that you want to delete the following prefix group
Please enter an external download URL.
Please enter a valid tag line.
Please provide a review with your rating.
Please select a valid parent category.
Prefixes belonging to this group will be disassociated, rather than deleted.
Provide a description for this release, highlighting new features, changes, etc.

Provide a more in-depth description of your resource, including its feature highlights and any other important information. You should also include installation instructions in this area, if any are required.
Provide a very brief, one-line description of your resource.
The requested resource could not be found.
The requested review could not be found.
The requested update could not be found.
The requested user has not published any resources.
The requested version could not be found.
Resources are being shown from all child categories.
This resource does not have any updates that you may view.

{username} submitted a new resource:
[url={resourceLink}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url] - [plain]{tagLine}[/plain]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={resourceLink}]Read more about this resource...[/url]

{username} updated [url={resourceLink}]{resourceTitle}[/url] with a new update entry:
[url={updateLink}]{title}[/url]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={updateLink}]Read the rest of this update entry...[/url]
This resource has been removed and is no longer available for download.
Select the category that best describes your resource.
Select / deselect all resources on this page
Someone replies to your resource review
Someone reviews one of your resources
There are currently no resources to display.
There are no resources in this category yet.
This category does not allow external commercial resources.
This category does not allow fileless resources.
This is the new version name for your resource, such as 1.0. You may not alter this once you have saved it. If you do not enter this, a new version will not be posted.
This operation can not be reversed.
This resource is currently awaiting approval.
This update is currently awaiting approval.
Someone updates a resource you are watching with a new update entry
Update thread title on resource deletion
User has posted at least X resources
Use {title} to refer to the current thread title.
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category {category} at {board} with email notification of updates.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{receiver}, {creator} updated a resource you are watching at {board}.
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the resource {resource} at {board} with email notification of updates.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this resource or disable all emails.
If selected, whenever a resource in this category is created, a thread will be posted in this forum.
{name} liked your update for the resource {title}.
{name} replied to your review of the resource {title}.
You are watching this resource. Use the button below if you would like to stop watching this resource.
You do not have permission to view the full content of this resource.
You have already rated this version. Re-rating it will remove your existing rating or review.
You may not delete the current version of a resource.
You may not delete the resource description.
You may not delete this resource update.
You may not delete this version of this resource.
You may not edit this resource update.
You may not edit this version of this resource.
You may only enter an external URL or upload a file.
You may only rate after downloading.
You may only reassign a resource to a user with permission to view resources.
You must provide either an update or a new version.
You must upload a file to create a version or resource.
You are not currently watching any resources.
You are not watching any categories.
You can only rate a resource version that you have downloaded.
Are you sure you want to delete this resource?
Are you sure you want to delete this review from {title}?
Are you sure you want to delete this review response from {title}?
Are you sure you want to delete this update from {title}?
Are you sure you want to delete version {version} of {title}?
Are you sure you want to delete {count} resource(s)?
Are you sure you want to like this resource update?
Are you sure you want to move {count} resource(s)?
Are you sure you want to reassign {count} resource(s)?
Are you sure you want to unlike this resource update?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all resources?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all resource categories?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for one resource?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for one resource category?

{xen:phrase x_created_resource_y, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $content}{$content.resource_title}'} {xen:phrase x_updated_resource_y, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $content}{$content.resource_title}'}
